participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: pragmatic and detail-oriented, enjoys routine and stability.
participant_1.background: i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i own a house in florida. i enjoy american sports. i am a male. i have a children and a dogs.

participant_2.personality: adventurous and curious, always seeking new experiences and knowledge.
